id.description: Unique identifier for the application fee refund

object.description: The object type, which will be 'fee_refund'

amount.description: The amount refunded in the application fee

balance_transaction.description: The balance transaction ID associated with the refund

created.description: Timestamp for when the refund was created

updated.description: Timestamp for when the refund was last updated

currency.description: The currency of the refunded amount

fee.description: The application fee ID associated with the refund

metadata.description: Additional information or custom data associated with the application fee refunds.

fee.description: Metadata related to the refunded fee
